argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ghmabl.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | ghmabl.y | |- Y = ( Base ` H ) |
| 3 |  | ghmabl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | ghmabl.q | |- .+^ = ( +g ` H ) |
| 5 |  | ghmabl.f | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X /\ y e. X ) -> ( F ` ( x .+ y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) .+^ ( F ` y ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | ghmabl.1 | |- ( ph -> F : X -onto-> Y ) |
| 7 |  | ghmabl.3 | |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ablgrp | |- ( G e. Abel -> G e. Grp ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) |
| 10 | 5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 9 | #P_ghmgrp | |- ( ph -> H e. Grp ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ablcmn | |- ( G e. Abel -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 12 | 7, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 12 | #P_ghmcmn | |- ( ph -> H e. CMnd ) |
| 14 |  | #P_isabl | |- ( H e. Abel <-> ( H e. Grp /\ H e. CMnd ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 13, 14 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> H e. Abel ) |
